CustomField.description: Does the property owner certify to the best of its knowledge and belief, that the property owner and/or any of its Principals are not presently indicted for, or otherwise criminalyy or civilly charged by a governmental entity with, commission of any of the offenses enumerated in paragraph (a)(1)(i)(B) of the clause, entitled "52.209-5 - CERTIFICATION REGARDING DEBARMENT, SUSPENSION, PROPOSED DEBARMENT AND OTHER RESPONSIBILITY MATTER (DEC 2001)," in the GSA Form 3518?
CustomField.label: Owner Indictment
